global.title: Payment types
global.add_card_type: Add payment type of credit cards
global.add_card_type_text_pk: As for now you have to be a registered tax payer in Russian Federation to get online payments.
global.add_card_type_text_paw:
If you have a legal entity of LLC, you can setup PayAnyWay credit card payments system to your project. It's simple.
  • PAW fee is 2,7% from each payment, an absolute minumim on the market.
  • No more fees of any kind.
  • Free setup.
  • You can withdraw funds as often as you need it.
  • allrpg.info is not in any way involved in the process, this fact radically speeds up your communication with PAW.

To setup the credit cards payments function, you have to do the following:
  • read our offer for Events Managers on Tickets services;
  • fully accept it by pressing «Setup credit card payments system» button below;
  • provide all the data needed for the non-residents and register on PayAnyWay (you will be automatically transferred to it);
  • if you'll encounter any difficulties, contact our support service;
  • login into a personal area, change the password and provide a security question;
  • fill out all the forms necessary defined in the personal area in the «Forms not yet provided» balloon;
  • wait for the PayAnyWay check and your transfer to a correct status;
  • after a message of status change create an extended account in PayAnyWay: in personal area you will see a button «Create an extended account»;
  • set during creation of extended account:
    • in the field «Alias» – your project's name;
    • press the button «Show additional fields»;
    • in the field «Pay URL» – //includes/payanyway.php;
    • in the field «Data integrity verification code» – any latin numbers and digits (save the code, you will need it later);
    • in the field «Payment form signature required» – yes;
    • in the field «Reassignment of settings in url is allowed» – yes;
  • provide extended account number and data integrity verification code in your project settings;
  • you have to send all the documents needed (found in the personal area, section «Documents») to PayAnyWay within a month by mail or by email (if signed by digital signature);
  • and announce the new feature to all of your players.
